text: ` ` Gossip Girl'' may have aired its last episode in 2012, but its popularity is still reverberating up until now, even sparking speculations of a reboot. The fact that it's currently one of the most popular series streamed online, a whole new demographic of teenage girls have reportedly been hooked to Blair Waldorf and Serena van der Woodsen's complicated social lives. Just the mere thought of a ` ` Gossip Girl'' reboot is making the fans excited for the upcoming episodes. Of course, it is expected that new actresses will play the lead roles, following the footsteps of the original Blair and Serena tandem.
